name: Metro de Caracas
description: This project aims to map out the Metro lines in Caracas using Perlin noise to draw dots that will map out the metro lines. As a reference I used an artwork published in the Gorilla Sun Newsletter.

name: Metro de Caracas
description: This is the first variation where I translated the canvas so it looks like the lines are horizontal.

name: Metro de Caracas
description: This is the second variation of the first week's artwork and I used lines to connect the dots do they look like the metro lines are connected.

name: Galaxy
description: This week's experiment is a galaxy created using Gravitational attraction, insppired by the examples presented in Garrit's lecture about complexity.

name: The Sun
description: This one is the second variation of the galaxy and is supposed to look like a solar system where there are planets and moons for each of the planets.

name: Traffic
description: This is an additional variation of the galaxy and is supposed to mimmic traffic using a flow field. The triangles represent the vehicles of different sizes and the roads are the flow fields.

name: Particle notes
description: This experiment was created based on the Particles assignment of the Foundations of Programming course, adding sound to the particles. Click on the screen to play a random note.
